front.title: NAT64 Deployment Guidelines in Operator and Enterprise Networks

abstract.t: This document describes how NAT64 ([RFC6146]) can be deployed in an IPv6 operator or enterprise network and the issues to be considered when having an IPv6-only access link, regarding: a) DNS64 ([RFC6147]), b) applications or devices that use literal IPv4 addresses or non-IPv6 compliant APIs, and c) IPv4-only hosts or applications.
